name: Leaping Lizards
description:
Controls

Click inside the window to start the game!

Works bests in landscape mode on mobile devices.

Press Space or tap or click to jump. dodge the critters and rack up a high score. The longer you go the higher your score goes!

Story

One day after eating Petunia the alligator decided to go for a walk on the beach. The sun was warm, the sky was blue, and other critters just kept getting in her way. She didn't want to disturb them though so she took a deep breath and started leaping. Some passerby shouted Leaping Lizards! when they saw her and here we are.

Have you ever lost internet connection while using Google Chrome? If so you may be familiar with  a certain dinosaur jumping game. This is like a Super Nintendo version of that. It has cute and funny graphics, good music, and gets pretty challenging. What's the highest score you can achieve?
